post.description:
Register a webhook in Lianlian Pay's system. Registered webhook will be used to send events generated by Lianlian Pay bank partner's system.

Return type is `Webhook` object

get.description:
Get a list of webhook registrations of a client. If no registrations, empty list will be returned.

Return type is List<`Webhook`>

Get a webhook registration details by `webhookId`.

Return type is `Webhook` object

put.description:
Edit a webhook registration by `webhookId`, such as turn on/off webhook, update webhook callback url, update registration topics.

Return type is `Webhook` object

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: Webhook id in Lianlian Pay's system

post.description:
Different types of transactions can be initiated on member accounts for different scenarios.

The function type is used to distinguish whether the transaction is initiated or returned. 

The transaction type is used to distinguish which scenario the tranaction belongs to.

| transactionType | Scenarios |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | Credit member account for fund in transit |
| 2 | Debit coupon account to member account |
| 3 | Debit member account to the platform's commission account |

Return type is `transaction` object

transactionType.description:
Transaction type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | Credit member account for fund in transit |
| 2 | Credit member account for marketing fund |
| 3 | Debit member account to the platform's commission account |

oldTransactionId.description: Original transaction ID, mandatory if the functionType = return

payChannelType.description:
Mandatory only if transactionType = 1 & functionType = initiate

Acquirer, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 0001 | Wechat |
| 0002 | Alipay |

payChannelAssignMerNo.description:
Mandatory only if transactionType = 1 & functionType = initiate

Merchant number assigned to platform in acquirer's system

payChannelTranSeqNo.description:
Mandatory only if transactionType = 1 & functionType = initiate

Transaction number in acquirer's system

parameters.name: functionType
parameters.description:
function type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| initiate | Initiate a transaction |
| return | Return a transaction |

post.description:
top-up a specific account

The function type is used to distinguish whether the transaction is initiated or returned.

topUpType.description:
transaction type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | Top-up for coupon account |

topUpId.description: Transaction ID generated in platform's system

oldTopUpId.description: Original transaction ID, mandatory if funactionType = return

parameters.name: functionType
parameters.description:
function type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| initiate | Initiate a top-up |
| return | Return a top-up |

get.description:
Get a transaction request details by id.

Return type is `transaction`object

parameters.name: functionType
parameters.description:
function type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| initiate | Initiate a transaction |
| return | Return a transaction |

get.description: Get a top-up transaction request details by transactionId.

parameters.name: functionType
parameters.description:
function type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| initial | Initial a transaction |
| return | Return a transaction |

post.description:
Create a sub account for each host to receive payment in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system.

Return type is `Member` ojbect.

get.description:
Get the sub account detail information of a host in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system by its ID.

Return type is `Member` object

delete.description: Delete the sub account of the host in Lianlian Pay partner's bank system.
Remove a beneficiary bank account in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system for a host.

parameters.name: bankAccountNumber
parameters.description: Bank account number or card number

post.description:
Payout from sub account to beneficiary bank account. Payout amount should no larger than the sub account balance.

Return type is `Payout` object.

payoutId.description: Payout ID generated in Platform System

get.description: Get a payout request details by payoutId.

Download report by `name`

Return type is `Report` object

Get a list of Lianlian Pay bank partner's system generated events. If no events, empty list will be returned

Return type is List<`Event`>

Get a Lianlian Pay bank partner's system generated event by `eventId`

Return type is `Event` object

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Event id in Lianlian Pay's system

get.description: Get bank account detail under a member that verifyStatus = 0 & verifyType = 2

post.description:
Add a beneficiary bank account for payout and bind to the sub account in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system for a host.

Return type is `add-bank-account-request`object

If the verifyStatus = 0, the bank account need to be verified in following two methods 

| Verification Type | Description|Capability|
|------|-------------|--------|
| UnionPay verification | Send SMS text to account holder's mobile | Only available for individual bank account|
| Small amount verification | Deposit random small amount to bank account | All type of bank account |

verifyType.description:
Verification type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | UnionPay verification |
| 2 | Small amount verification |

memberIdType.description:
ID type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | National ID |
| 4 | Chinese Passport|
| 52 | Business Registration Certificate |
| 73 | Unified social credit code |

bankCnapsCode.description: Bank code defined in China National Advanced Payment System

parameters.name: bankAccountNumber
parameters.description: Bank account number or card number

put.description:
Request to verify a host's beneficiary bank account in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system.

Two types of verification refer to different verification informations

| Verification Type | Verification Information |
|------|-------------|
| UnionPay verification | SMS text |
| Small amount verification | Random amount deposited in to beneficiary account |

verifyType.description:
Verification type, one of:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 1 | UnionPay verification |
| 2 | Small amount verification |

verifyInfo.description:
Input SMS code if verifyType=1
Input amount of receiving fund if verifyType=2

get.description:
Get the detail of all functional sub-account

|Code|Description|Usage|
|--------|--------|----|
|1|coupon account| fund in this account can be transfered to member account for marketing purpose |
|2|commission account| fund belonged to platform will be deposited into this account |
|3|holding account| fund in this account can be transfered to coupon account |

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.description:
Object used in Lianlian Pay's system to describe the client registration of event callbacks.

Lianlian Pay uses this object to identify events which should be pushed back to client's url.

id.description: Webhook registration id in Lianlian Pay's system

modifyTime.description: Webhook last modified time, UTC+0 timestamp

topics.description: Event topics in Lianlian Pay's system

event.title: Event
event.description: Event object generated during business processing in Lianlian Pay's system.

id.description: Event id in Lianlian Pay's system

topic.description:
Event topics defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

| Topic | Description |
|------|-------------|
| member.payout.success | Payout success. |
| member.payout.failed | Payout failed. |
| reconciliation.transaction.created |Transaction reconciliation documents created.|
| reconciliation.topup.created | Topup reconciliation documents created. |
| reconciliation.payout.created | Payout reconciliation documents created. |
| reconciliation.balance.created | End-of-day member account balance reconciliation documents created. |

report.title: Report
report.description:
Report object defined in Lianlian Pay's system. Used to download reports such as reconcilation files generated in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system.

<!-- theme: info -->
>Two ways to access daily reconcilation files:
>
>1. Request "Get Report" API with file name following below reconciliation file name format defination after 08:00 PM(GMT+8) everyday to download.
>
>2. Enroll Lianlian Pay Webhook and register `reconciliation.transaction.created`, `reconciliation.payout.created`, `reconciliation.balance.created`, `reconciliation.topup.created` topics to receive file ready notices, then download by requesting "Get Report" API.
> 

Applicable reconciliation file types:

| Name Format | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| TRANSACTION_YYYYMMDD.gz | Transaction request reconcilation file
| PAYOUT_YYYYMMDD.gz | Payout request reconcilation file
| BALANCE_YYYYMMDD.gz | Member account EOD balance file|
| TOPUP_YYYYMMDD.gz | Top-up request reconcilation file|

add-bank-account-request.title: add-bank-account-request
add-bank-account-request.description:
add bank account request object defined in Lianlian Pay bank partner's system.

The verifyStatus is used to distinguish whether the bank account has been verified.

verifyStatus.description:
Whether the bank account has been verified

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 0 | Wait to be verified |
| 1 | Verified |

isFunded.description: Whether the small amount fund has been transfered
